summary.theDifferenceWillBeCharged: <0>{{costInfoHigherTrans}}</0> The difference will be charged immediately. The difference is proportional to the time left until the end of the current billing period.
summary.thisWillCostYouLess: This will cost you {{cost}} less each month.
summary.thisWillCostYouMore: This will cost you {{cost}} more each month.
summary.youAreChangingToACheaper: <0>{{costInfoLowerTrans}}</0> You are changing to a cheaper subscription - there is no refund. However, you will pay a lower monthly fee from your next billing period. If you have paid more than the new subscription fee, no further payment is required.

scheduleBackup.title: Schedule backup and updates
scheduleBackup.wePerformMaintenance: We perform maintenance on your memoQ cloud server <0>{{everyDayTrans}}</0>. The maintenance includes creating a full backup of the server and installing updates if there are any. Normally, it takes 1-2 minutes, but never more than 30 minutes.

settings.title: Settings

start.lead: You are going to set up your cloud server in two easy steps and it takes only a few minutes.
start.title: Set up cloud subscription

backupSettings.lead: We perform maintenance on your memoQ cloud server <0>{{everyDayTrans}}</0>. The maintenance includes creating a full backup of the server and installing updates if there are any. Normally, this takes 1-2 minutes, but never more than 30 minutes.
backupSettings.title: Schedule backup and updates
